CustomField.formula: Case(StageName, "Disengaged", "Closed/Lost", "Maintenance Cancelled", "Closed/Lost", "Order Lost / Disengaged", "Closed/Lost", "Pipeline (Unqualified Opportunity)", null, "Pipeline (Qualified opportunity)", "1-Sales Lead", "Quoted", "2-Validate Opportunity", "Upside (Best case)", "2-Validate Opportunity", "Committed", "3-Establish Value", "Will Renew", "3-Establish Value", "Order In - Processing", "4-Reach Agreement", "Order In - Processed", "Closed/Won", "Order In", "Closed/Won", "Completed", "Closed/Won", null)
CustomField.label: Dassault Sales Stage
